meaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>roof</radical> of <radical>life</radical> a <radical>mouth</radical> with a <radical>knife</radical> <kanji>divide</kanji>s cells to create life.
readingMnemonic:
As it <kanji>divide</kanji>s life, the mouth begins to look really familiar. It has big teeth and a crooked mustache... it's <reading>Wari</reading>o (わり)!

Sometimes Wario cuts himself by accident and just becomes <reading>わ</reading> (which is all he says too).
